entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
